sys_atf_step.description: This ATF step generates the current date/time and adds or subtracts a specified duration from it. The operation input determines whether to add or subtract from the current date/time. The duration input should be in the format 'x[d|h|m|s] y[d|h|m|s] ...', where 'x', 'y', etc. are the number of days, hours, minutes, or seconds to add or subtract from the current date/time. The output of this step is the new date/time as a string.

test.display_value: TC - 324 - SEC17 - Wrong Manager - IT copy

sys_update_version.name: sys_atf_step_b55a446a1b65a19062e50ed2cd4bcb2b
